bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Part 16: Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Part 16: Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.16Rev2/D8 Dec 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies the air interface, including the medium access control layer (MAC) and physical layer (PHY), of combined fixed and mobile point-to-multipoint broadband wireless access (BWA) systems providing multiple services. The MAC is structured to support multiple PHY specifications, each suited to a particular operational environment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
